quiet-woodland.name: Quiet woodland
quiet-woodland.description: A source of wood, but increases wildness and cannot be used for farming.

orchard.name: Orchard
orchard.description: An abundant grove of fruit trees.

boar.name: Forest with boar
boar.description: They're easy to track and provide a good amount of food.

deer.name: Forest with deer
deer.description: A source of food, deep in the forest.

thick-forest.name: Deep forest
thick-forest.description: Great surprises and adventures await those who dare to venture this far into the woods.

driftwood.name: Driftwood
driftwood.description: There's so much fallen wood here. You'll be able to use a lot of it in future.

shallow-coast.name: Gentle coastline
shallow-coast.description: To catch fish you'll need to venture a little further out, but a jetty can be built here to land boats.

cliffs.name: Rugged coastline
cliffs.description: The cliffs are too steep here for a harbour, but the views are magnificent.

open-sea.name: Open sea
open-sea.description: Teeming with fish of all types, waiting for you to catch.

rocks.name: Treacherous Rocks
rocks.description: Woe betide the sailor who attemps to pass.

clearing.name: Clearing
clearing.description: Thank goodness - a break from the trees.

meadows.name: Rolling meadows
meadows.description: Can be used for farming, building and grazing livestock.

ruined-village.name: Ruined village
ruined-village.description: Something terrible happened here... not too long ago.
